item.title: AWS SAMを使ってみる
item.description: AWS SAMとは Github : AWS Serverless Application Model (AWS SAM) The goal of AWS SAM is to define a standard application model for serverless applications. This GitHub project is the starting point for AWS SAM, and contains general information, information about the model, and examples of common applications. 日本語訳 AWS SAMの目標は、サーバレス
